entities: United Nations Verification Mission in Colombia
summary:
The Security Council:

Welcomes accomplishments in the laying down of arms process between the Government of Colombia and FARC-EP, as per the "Final Agreement for Ending the Conflict and Building a Stable and Lasting Peace" signed on 24 November 2016.

Recalls resolution 2366 (2017) which established the United Nations Verification Mission in Colombia to verify implementation of sections 3.2 and 3.4 of the Final Agreement.

Welcomes the announcement of a temporary bilateral ceasefire between the Government of Colombia and ELN from 1 October to 12 January 2018.

Having considered the Secretary-General's report S/2017/745, 

1. Welcomes the report and approves recommendations regarding the size, operational aspects and mandate of the United Nations Verification Mission in Colombia.
